title: liblink, cmd/9g: [dev.cc] -S output messed up
body:
Compiling even the most trivial file such as:

```go
package main

func main() {

}
```

with 9g -S from the dev.cc branch produces insane output (https://gist.github.com/mwhudson/747ac3935cb84080a409, scroll to the right).  What seems to be happening is that each time an instruction is printed it reprints all instructions from that function already, like some buffer isn't being reset or something.  It doesn't happen on master.
